questions.question: This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
Taking place on an island on the back of an elephant, this arc delves into the history of the Mink Tribe and the Kozuki Family. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

questions.question: This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This new character, a skilled samurai and one of the Nine Red Scabbards, is known for their mastery of the Nitoryu style. Who is...?
